Key Match Events: The Yankees blew a 5-run lead in the 5th inning due to errors and missed outfield plays.
Tommy Kahnle and Luke Weaver gave away free bases in the 8th inning, leading to the Dodgers' game-winning rally.
Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees lamented their lack of execution, particularly in the critical moments of the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first World Series catcher's interference since 1982.
Others: The Yankees lost the World Series in Game 5, ending their 2024 season.
